CheckBoxPreference.android:title: No status
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable the small status messages for picture upload.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Fullscreen mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Fullscreen camera preview does not work on all devices. App restart required! Reinstall or clear app data if not working!

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Shutter sound
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable the Android shutter sound when taking pictures. Disable does not work on all devices.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Wait for Camera
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Delay picture for this many milliseconds in background modes. Give the camera time to take the picture after opening! Required on many devices to avoid overexposed shots.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Keep screen on
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Some devices will need to keep the screen on or the app will fall to sleep.
Start the app automatically after bootup. Use if you need reboot function or have an unstable device.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Open Settings
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Open these settings instead of camera view when starting the app from launcher or notification. Useful for background mode configuration.
